title: Numbers count : common fractions
creator_credit: Susan Redden, Australian Broadcasting Corporation, Susan Oliver and Mark Stanforth
brief_description: This video provides a basic introduction to the concept of fractions - whole, halves, quarters, thirds, eighths and sixteenths. It uses both a 10th birthday party and the irascible puppets from the ABC program “The Ferals” to provide examples of common everyday usage of fractions. Suitable for Lower-Middle Primary Level students.
